tool_description: Format preserving tokenization. Replace your sensitive data with tokens that cannot be decrypted, only detokenized!

api_list.name: detokenize
api_list.description: The detokenize endpoint takes a token and returns the original string provided for that token. The original string was provided in the tokenize endpoint call, as the 'value' parameter.

api_list.name: tokenize
api_list.description: Tokenizes a value passed to the endpoint. The value must be 1KB or smaller and certain characters are not allowed.
